titleStmt.title: Syntaxis mathematica, or, A construction of the harder problemes of geometry with so much of the conicks as is therefore requisite and other more ordinary and usefull propositions inter-mixed, and tables to several purposes / by Tho. Gibson.
titleStmt.author: Gibson, Thomas, 17th/18th cent.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by R. & W. Leybourne for Andrew Crook,
